actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: To provide grants to State-recognized or federally recognized apprenticeship programs to support the expansion, awareness, and prestige of such programs, and for other purposes.
short_title: Accessing Professional Partnerships and Resources to Enable Necessary Training and Improve Career Education Act of 2018

summary.text:
Accessing Professional Partnerships and Resources to Enable Necessary Training and Improve Career Education Act of 2018 or the APPRENTICE Act

This bill directs the Department of Labor to provide grants to state-recognized or federally recognized apprenticeship programs to support the expansion, awareness, and prestige of such programs.

titles.title: To provide grants to State-recognized or federally recognized apprenticeship programs to support the expansion, awareness, and prestige of such programs, and for other purposes.
